channel.title: Help please i got 1 error but i dont know what to do

item.title: Help please i got 1 error but i dont know what to do
item.dc:creator: @nwe_luigi2 nwe luigi2
item.description:
@nwe_luigi2 wrote:

i tried to add a special attack for a dds so i used this code and added in boolean attack

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount >= 25) { gfx100(252); calculateSpecial(); DDSpec(); AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer(); usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; }
but when i add it i get this error if i compile:

client.java:25545: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ 1 error

Read full topic
item.source: Help please i got 1 error but i dont know what to do
